page.title: 10"I Remember"
page.content: Living on the Grove estate above old Lowtown,Mr.Bill Williams,a resident of Bridgnorth the whole of his 84 years told us some changes he had noticed."More things to do and see than in my day"."More shops in Lowtown today,there only used to be J.C.Lloyd the grocer at the bridge end.He could remember when the whole of the Grove area was no more than"open fields with rabbits in them,it was pretty then." When asked what changes he would like to see,Mr.Williams replied:"the boats back on the river and the whole river side made tidy again."Mr.Williams lives at the top of a flight of steps which lead down to Lowtown. These steps could tell many a tale,dark and dank, closed in by a high wall.
